price: Na sema: Kweli imefika, na uwongo umetoweka. Hakika uwongo lazima utoweke!
arabic: وَقُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ كَانَ زَهُوقٗا
footnotes: Na sema ukiwaonya watu wako washirikina: Haki ya Tawhid, Imani ya Mungu Mmoja, na Dini ya Kweli na Uadilifu, imekwisha fika. Na uwongo, na ushirikina, na dini ya ufisadi na dhulma, yote hayo yameondoka. Kwani uwongo daima hauna dawamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqul jāa al-ḥaqu wazahaqa al-bāṭilu inna al-bāṭila kāna zahūqan
